Text:
So is the "Buy the comics!" supposed to make you feel better about the illegal act that you are committing by distributing copyrighted works without permission?
Dude, we're all the same here, don't think that you're better than anyone..
@24Brink - Hmm. Projecting guilt as hostility, this one is. I sense the dark side.

Wow.  Aaaaaaaanyways......

BUY THE COMICS!

They're fun to read, and this storyline is crazy good.  But if no one buys them, they won't make them.  I purchased physical copies of every issue, to support the artists.  I'm no better than anyone else, except.....maybe you, psycho.
